basics.name: Alexey Ivanov
basics.label: Front-End / Software / React / Developer
basics.summary: Software Developer with over 5 years of experience, specializing in efficient cloud resource optimization for high-profile clients like Airbnb and Facebook. Demonstrates proficiency in building user-focused frontend applications with React and TypeScript, seamlessly uniting UI/UX design and robust code. Committed to promoting fast-paced application development through clear communication and an innovative approach to new technologies. Passionate about crafting high-performance cloud solutions that bolster business success.

work.name: Self Employed
work.description: As a self-employed software developer, I specialize in crafting e-commerce solutions tailored for online food sales, achieving measurable outcomes:
work.summary:
— Led creation of e-commerce platforms, enhancing online food retail sales by 30%.
— Optimized performance for fast load times, reducing bounce rates by 25%.
— Integrated third-party services and APIs, streamlining checkout processes and increasing customer satisfaction.
highlights: Next / Typescript / HTML / SCSS / Node/ Express / MongoDB

work.name: Global Relay
work.description: Global Relay is a leading provider of cloud-based messaging, archiving, and compliance solutions for the financial services industry, committed to implementing best practices and fostering a collaborative, clean environment to ensure optimal performance and security.
work.summary:
— Enhanced maintainability and scalability by implementing a new frontend architecture, reducing system errors by 20% through collaborative teamwork and optimization, including rigorous code review and unit testing.
— Strengthened security features by developing a new password selection feature, resulting in a 30% decrease in unauthorized access attempts, showcasing best practices in security with thorough unit testing.
— Empowered users by introducing a feature enabling the selection of stronger and more secure passwords, implementing industry best practices with comprehensive unit tests.
— Contributed to reducing technical debt by refactoring legacy system components, resulting in a 25% increase in system performance through effective optimization and extensive unit testing.
— Updated and improved design documentation to ensure enhanced project clarity and understanding, resulting in a 20% reduction in development time, emphasizing best practices in documentation alongside thorough unit testing.
— Addressed a substantial number of security and quality (SQ) issues throughout the past year through collaborative debugging efforts and comprehensive unit testing.
— Managed the successful onboarding of 5 CO-OPs through dedicated mentorship and tailored training programs, enhancing teamwork and collaborative learning.
highlights: React / Typescript / HTML / SCSS / Docker / Kubernetes / Figma / Jest / React - testing - library / Git / Webpack

work.name: Capgemini Engineering
work.description: Top-1 global engineering and digital services company
work.summary:
— Contributed to developing a data pipeline monitoring application by creating and improving the API functionality, resulting in a 40% improvement in data processing efficiency.
— Revamped the user interface, achieving a 40% decrease in user-reported errors, enhancing user experience with the pipelines.
— Expanded UI with additional pipeline parameters, boosting user engagement by 30%.
— Restructured the infrastructure application, transitioning from a class-based approach to functional components
— Restructured application infrastructure to functional components/hooks.
— Implemented TypeScript and rigorously conducted unit testing, reducing bugs by 30% and increasing code coverage by 20%, ensuring robust code quality and reliability.
highlights: React / Typescript / HTML / SCSS / Jest / React - testing - library / Git / Webpack

work.name: Barsum Cloud Analytics
work.description: A leader in the Russian market, which designs software that helps banks run and save money in managing the­ir cloud systems
work.summary:
— Optimized cloud resource planning for leading banks, resulting in a 15% reduction in resource consumption costs within 6 months
— Led the transition from class-based to functional components, enhancing application responsiveness by 30%
— Expanded the existing User Interface (UI) by incorporating additional pipeline parameters
— Restructured and redeveloped the infrastructure application, transitioning from a class-based approach to functional
highlights: React / Typescript / HTML / SCSS / Redux / Git / Webpack
